  -- RAM content
  signal mem : dp_ar_ram_type := (
--BEGIN_WORDS_ENTRY
128 => "00000000000000000000000000000000",
0 => "00000001000000000000000100000000",
1 => "00000001001101100000001000010000",
2 => "00000000101001110000000100010101",
3 => "00000000000000000000000000000000",
others => (others => '0')
--END_WORDS_ENTRY
    );
